problem: there was a family of quicks on my block a family we all knew im talkin bout john damian and that boy jrue they had an unfair proof that lived in their shoe technological truth madeem quicker than you their quick was quick im talkin bout the quickest quick ever seen from outside the gym you could hear the crowd scream challengers and challenges brungem to the floor they cut and crossed over until there wasnt no more competition that is people keep asking you whats up in that shoe first draft pick rookie of the year all star games too looking back on the sell homie who wouldve even knew that all of that quick could come from inside of a shoe those kicks made these cats rare and when you crazy quick man quick aint fair
